scripts.build: rm -rf lib && rm -rf types && tsc && npm run build:dist && npm run build:tools
scripts.build:dist1: rm -rf dist && tsc --p tsconfig.dist.json && cat src/types/bignumber.d.ts dist/index.d.ts > dist/tmp && mv dist/tmp dist/index.d.ts
scripts.build:tools: cd tools && rm -rf bin && tsc && chmod 744 bin/compile.js && cd ..
scripts.test:compile: rm -rf test/compiler/src && (for i in `ls test/compiler/solconfig.*.json` ; do echo $i ; tools/bin/compile.js $i ; done) && tsc -p test/compiler && if diff -r test/compiler/expected test/compiler/src ; then echo "results are the same as expcted" ; else echo "results are different than the expected"; fi
